name: HedBanz
description:
Hedbanz is the goofy guessing game that keeps you guessing to figure out what the card is on your headband. Ask yes or no questions to figure out the animal, food, or thing. Be the first one to guess 3 cards correctly to win the game! Download the Hedbanz app to put a face filter on the player’s face and share on social media!

SUPPORTED DEVICES

Compatible with iPhone 6s and up on devices with iOS version 10 and above.
Updates may affect compatibility.
